alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued October 23 at 1:40PM MDT until October 25 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Flash freeze of roadways. Gusty northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph Flathead Valley to Flathead Lake. Gusts up to 40 mph at Badrock Canyon. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches possible, locally higher on the west side of Flathead Lake. * WHERE...Mission Valley, Flathead Valley, Highway 93 Eureka to Whitefish, Highway 56 Bull Lake Road, Polson, Highway 2 Kalispell to Libby, Highway 37 Eureka to Libby, and Flathead Lake * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening and Wednesday morning commutes. An arctic cold front may stall Tuesday afternoon thereby keeping the Mission Valley warm, but temperatures are expected to plummet by Tuesday night.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region
